content.text: Match ends, Manchester United 3, Stoke City 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester United 3, Stoke City 0.
Attempt missed. Paul Pogba (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Scott McTominay (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Bruno Martins Indi (Stoke City).
Attempt saved. Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Nemanja Matic.
Corner,  Manchester United. Conceded by Kurt Zouma.
Attempt missed. Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left.
Attempt saved. Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Xherdan Shaqiri.
Attempt saved. Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Antonio Valencia.
Substitution, Manchester United. Scott McTominay replaces Juan Mata.
Corner,  Manchester United. Conceded by Kevin Wimmer.
Substitution, Manchester United. Marcus Rashford replaces Anthony Martial.
Substitution, Manchester United. Marouane Fellaini replaces Jesse Lingard.
Offside, Manchester United. Juan Mata tries a through ball, but Romelu Lukaku is caught offside.
Goal!  Manchester United 3, Stoke City 0. Romelu Lukaku (Manchester United) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Anthony Martial.
Substitution, Stoke City. Mame Biram Diouf replaces Peter Crouch.
Attempt missed. Ramadan Sobhi (Stoke City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Stephen Ireland.
